snippet: While paid sick-leave legislation has stalled in the New Jersey Legislature, supporters are taking the cause to individual cities and towns, emboldened by laws recently passed in Newark, Jersey City and New York City.
abstract: New Jersey Working Families Alliance is leading coalition of advocacy groups to make paid sick leave mandatory in New Jersey; group is waging a city by city campaign to let voters decide the issue, rather than waiting for state lawmakers to act.
lead_paragraph: While paid sick-leave legislation has stalled in the New Jersey Legislature, supporters are taking the cause to individual cities and towns, emboldened by laws recently passed in Newark, Jersey City and New York City.

headline.main: In New Jersey, Workers’ Advocates Aim to Put Paid Sick Time on Ballot
headline.print_headline: In New Jersey, Workers’ Advocates Aim to Put Paid Sick Time on Ballot
